Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Urinary System Disorder/Urethra Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Urethra Disorder/Urethritis
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Inflammation involving the URETHRA. Similar to CYSTITIS, clinical symptoms range from vague discomfort to painful urination (DYSURIA), urethral discharge, or both.
